component.name: Waveform 13
component.summary: Digital audio workstation for all music creators

description.p: Waveform is a rapidly evolving application specifically designed for the needs of modern music producers. Specializing in creative and inspirational workflows and avoiding features not explicitly needed to allow the app to remain surprisingly fun and intuitive. While other apps try to appeal to broad user groups, for example film score, live sound, performance - Waveform is laser focused on music production.
